metadata.name: Emodus #1
metadata.description:
Emodus is the first PFP NFT to use only facial expressions of emotion as its distinguishing feature.

Forget laser eyes and mushroom hats, express yourself with emotions which are the accessories of the soul.

A total of 3763 avatars, each one is unique due to the combinations of different environments, body status’, core emotions and facial expressions which gives them their “Modus”.
